sourceDesc.p: Transcriptions of 9 interviews carried out in August 2018. Interview 1 and part of interview 2 were transcribed verbatim including false starts and hesitations; the other transcriptions leave out these features, but are otherwise full transcriptions of the interviews apart from responses to initial factual questions, which are encoded instead as part of the "person" element for each interviewee.
